Class DrawingCanvasController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.manageproject.editing.drawingcanvas.DrawingCanvasController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingListener

    public class DrawingCanvasController
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawingListener
    Manages the choice and drawing of diagrams
